response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell this product to you for $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving for you, while still ensuring a substantial return for me. I believe this offer strikes the right balance between our interests and I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
